chart.title: Emissions of air pollutants
chart.subtitle: Air pollutants are gases that can lead to negative impacts on human health and ecosystems. Most are produced from energy, industry, and agriculture.

Nitrogen oxide (NOx).citationShort: Community Emissions Data System (CEDS) 2024. – processed by Our World in Data
Nitrogen oxide (NOx).citationLong: Community Emissions Data System (CEDS) 2024. – processed by Our World in Data. “Nitrogen oxide (NOx)” [dataset]. Community Emissions Data System (CEDS) 2024., “air_pollution_ceds” [original data].
